channel.title: People can not connect to my client says can not connect try again in minutes
channel.description:
Title says it all,
I am running a 474 i have been through client.java and changed server ip from 127.0.0.1 to my server ip i have been in my signlink file and changed the code to work properly i have added 43594 to my exception rule in my firewall on my router and also in my firewall on windows i have been able to successfully host my 317 server i portforward via uttorent sorry if this is not enough detail i am quite braindead i've been working on the 317 source for the past 2 days straight and its 2 am where i live.
can anyone out there help me at all or i have been looking into webclients would this solve any of these problems im coming across i would of thought it would still mean people would get stuck on update server but please let me know
Regards Junes
P.S NOTE!!!! this is NOT a 317 server so do not say go into server.java, egui.java, gui.java do not say i need to portfoward unless 474 uses a different port.... as people have no trouble logging into the 317 (this is for the people who do not read properly so please dont flame)

item.title: People can not connect to my client says can not connect try again in minutes
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

ummmm if he read correctly then he wouldnt even try if thats his only suggestion.

Read full topic
